languages.text: "Охотно верю. Со своей стороны должен отметить, что вы тоже оказались куда менее удобным инструментом, чем я рассчитывал, и чуть не поставили мою операцию под угрозу срыва. Если бы это случилось, поверь, я бы не ограничился твоим сердцем".
"I readily believe that. Since we are being so candid, I must note that you proved to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated."
languages.original_text: "Охотно верю. Со своей стороны должен отметить, что вы тоже оказались куда менее удобным инструментом, чем я рассчитывал, и чуть не поставили мою операцию под угрозу срыва. Если бы это случилось, поверь, я бы не ограничился твоим сердцем".

traits.locale_text: "I readily believe you. I must note that you happened to be a much less convenient tool that I had anticipated, jeopardising my entire operation. Trust me, if it happened, then I wouldn't have stopped at just your heart."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I readily believe you. I must note that you happened to be a much less convenient tool that I had anticipated, jeopardising my entire operation. Trust me, if it happened, then I wouldn't have stopped at just your heart."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I readily believe you. I must note that you happened to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated, jeopardising my entire operation. Trust me, had it happened, I wouldn't have stopped at just ripping out your heart."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I readily believe you. I must note that you happened to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated, jeopardising my entire operation. Trust me, had it happened, I wouldn't have stopped at just ripping out your heart."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I readily believe that. Since we are being so candid, I must note that you proved to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated. You nearly jeopardised my entire operation. Had you succeeded, I assure you I wouldn't have stopped at ripping out your heart."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I readily believe that. Since we are being so candid, I must note that you proved to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Je vous crois sans peine. Puisque nous parlons franchement, je dois dire que vous avez été un outil bien moins utile que prévu. »
languages.original_text: "I readily believe that. Since we are being so candid, I must note that you proved to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous crois sans peine. Puisque nous parlons franchement, je dois dire que vous avez été un outil bien moins utile que prévu. Vous avez même failli compromettre toute mon opération. Si c'était arrivé, je vous assure que je ne me serais pas contenté de vous arracher le cœur. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Sé que lo habría hecho. Ya que nos estamos sincerando, debo decir que ha demostrado ser una herramienta mucho menos conveniente de lo que esperaba».
languages.original_text: "I readily believe that. Since we are being so candid, I must note that you proved to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated."

traits.locale_text: «Sé que lo habría hecho. Debo mencionar que ha resultado ser una herramienta mucho menos útil de lo que había anticipado, dado que ha puesto en peligro toda mi operación. Créame, de haberlo conseguido, yo no me habría contentado con arrancarle el corazón».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我很愿意相信这一点。既然我们已经坦诚相待，那我必须指出这个事实：你这个工具比我预期得要差太多了。”
languages.original_text: "I readily believe that. Since we are being so candid, I must note that you proved to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated."

traits.locale_text: “我很相信你的话。而且我必须指出，你这个工具比我想象得要差太多了，你对我的整个计划构成了危害。相信我，如果你真的毁了我的计划，光是把你的心挖出来，对我来说恐怕远远不够。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Das glaube ich sofort. Und wo wir schon so offen reden, muss ich anmerken, dass Ihr ein sehr viel weniger nützliches Werkzeug wart, als ich es vermutet hatte."
languages.original_text: "I readily believe that. Since we are being so candid, I must note that you proved to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated."

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube Euch sofort. Ich muss anmerken, dass Ihr ein sehr viel weniger nützliches Werkzeug wart, als ich es vermutet hatte. Ihr habt meine gesamte Operation gefährdet. Glaubt mir, wäre es dazu gekommen, wäre ich nicht davor zurückgeschreckt, Euch einfach das Herz herauszureißen."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「私は喜んであなたを信じよう。正直に言えば、私が期待していたより、あなたは、はるかに使いにくい道具だった」
languages.original_text: "I readily believe that. Since we are being so candid, I must note that you proved to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated."

traits.locale_text: 「私は喜んであなたを信じよう。私が予想していたより、あなたは、はるかに使いにくい道具だった。私の作戦すべてを危険にさらしかねなかった。信じてくれ、もしそうなっていたら、私はあなたの心臓を引き裂くだけでは済まなかっただろう」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Sana inanıyorum. Madem bu kadar dürüst oluyoruz, senin de beklediğimden çok daha az yararlı bir araç olduğunu söylemek isterim."
languages.original_text: "I readily believe that. Since we are being so candid, I must note that you proved to be a much less convenient tool than I had anticipated."
